title: Are these pictures of the weapon recovered from the house of Tahir Hussain? Here’s the truth | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
After the recent Delhi riots, several pictures of weapons is being circulated on social media with a claim that they were recovered from the house of Tahir Hussain.

Link to the above post.

ALSO READ: Cows in UP wearing masks? Here’s the truth behind this picture…

NewsMobile fact-checked the above post and found that the pictures are old.

On putting the individual pictures through Reverse Image Search, we found the following:

This image a 2016 picture from Rajkot, Gujarat, when weapons were seized from a store.

We found the image in an article by Gujarat headlines dated 2016. According to the article, the picture is from Rajkot, Gujarat, when weapons were seized from a store.

We found that this picture is from a ‘kirpan’ factory in Patiala, Punjab. This picture was featured in an India Today article dated 2018.

The above information proves that the viral post is fake.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
